type_header_font.label: Font
type_header_font.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

type_body_font.label: Font
type_body_font.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

paragraph.content: Results can be of type 'page', 'product' or 'article'. Each setting below applies to each as applicable

alt_title.label: Use body font instead of heading font for card title

assc_product_crop_shape.label: Article Associated Product Image Crop Shape
assc_product_crop_shape.info: Relies on the addition of article metafields. TODO: Link to documentation

paragraph.content: This is generated from the complementary products you specify inside the Search and Discovery app. TODO: Link to documentation
These are generated from the featured icons product metafield. If you'd rather use basic icons, choose the 'Featured Basic Icons' block instead. TODO: Link to documentation
If you'd rather use custom metafields icons, choose the 'Featured Metafields Icons' block instead.

title.label: Icons Title

alt_heading.label: Use body font instead of heading font for heading

show_option_labels.label: Show option labels and option descriptions
show_option_labels.info: Option descriptions can be added using metafields TODO: Link to documentation

show_gift_card_recipient.label: Show recipient form for gift card products
show_gift_card_recipient.info: When enabled, gift card products can optionally be sent to a recipient with a personal message.

paragraph.content: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/theme-structure/theme-features#featured-product-rating)

hero.label: Use as hero
hero.info: Select this setting if this section contains the page title. Try to include one page title/hero section per page. Learn More TODO: Link to documentation.

button_label.label: Label
button_label.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

alt_heading.label: Use body font instead of heading font for collection titles

view_all_button_label.label: View All Button Label
view_all_button_label.info: If excluded, no view all button will display

enable_sticky_details.label: Enable collection details to 'stick'
enable_sticky_details.info: 'Sticks' within view while user scrolls through product cards. Requires product cards to be taller than collection details per collection row.

display_collection_image.label: Display collection image
display_collection_image.info: This feature depends on assigning an image to the collection.
